Title: High Neck Beaded Formal Gown

----

Sku: 8105

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice:

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 4, 10, 8, 14, 12, 6

----

Colors: red, royal

----

Category: formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: 8105-royal-high-neck-beade-formal-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: This high neckline gown is sure to please. Capped sleeves and sheer illusion give the dress an element of intrigue. The bead work created the illusion of a necklace that flows through the bodice and continues to the cut out back of the gown. The asymmetrical hem and light train add to the poshness of this gown. This gown is perfect for your red carpet event.
